blogentry.blogcontents: We are pleased to annouce that our new blog is on the edge of completion! Designed by our own developer, Liam4, the OpenSprites blog shall be updated frequently with interesting things to read. This will include tips and tricks for using Scratch, OpenSprites news, Scratch news, and updates on the development on the site. Every developer has access to the blog, and may release posts when they wish. Thanks, and stay tuned! -cheeseeater
